sentences.english: He was abashed at forgetting his wife's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他因忘了妻子的生日而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: His sunken cheeks slowly reddened and burned with miserable shame.
sentences.chinese: 他羞愧万分，凹陷的面颊上慢慢地透出了红色。

sentences.english: They're ashamed of having come from noncompliant families.
sentences.chinese: 他们因为来自超生家庭而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: I'm not ashamed of my incompetence in these areas.
sentences.chinese: 我对这些领域的无能无力毫不羞愧。

sentences.english: In introducing this month's theme, I fell just a little shamefaced .
sentences.chinese: 介绍这个月的主题时，我感到有些羞愧。

sentences.english: As the Scripture says, "Anyone who trusts in him will never be put to shame."
sentences.chinese: 经上说，凡信他的人，必不至于羞愧。

sentences.english: He is ashamed for his former dishonorable action.
sentences.chinese: 他对他以前不光彩的行为感到羞愧。

sentences.english: This includes the shy dogs and the fear biters.
sentences.chinese: 这其中包括胆怯羞愧和出于畏惧而攻击的犬只。

sentences.english: Many were ashamed of having gone so meekly.
sentences.chinese: 许多人对自己当时如此逆来顺受感到羞愧。

sentences.english: I will speak of your statutes before kings and will not be put to shame
sentences.chinese: 我也要在君王面前，论说你的法度，并不至于羞愧。

sentences.english: It converted the passive suffering of shame into energy, activity, aggression.
sentences.chinese: 这把羞愧的消极痛苦转变成了精力，活动和挑衅。

sentences.english: She hung her head in shame.
When did admitting you can’t afford something become shameful?
sentences.chinese: 在什么时候承认你买不起一些东西会变得羞愧难当呢？

sentences.english: In introducing this month's theme, I fell just a little shamefaced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍这个月的主题时，我感到有一点点羞愧。

sentences.english: The little boy squirmed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 这个小男孩因羞愧而局促不安。

sentences.english: God is ashamed when the prosperous boasts of his special favor.
sentences.chinese: 繁荣者自夸其受神的特别荣宠，神也感到羞愧。

definition: ashamed and unable to show one's face
guilty conscience/to feel a twinge of guilt
to feel guilty/to feel ashamed of oneself/to be remorseful
lacking in confidence/diffident/to have a guilty conscience
